Title: Relates to creating a volunteer firefighter scholarship program; appropriation
Summary: Creates a volunteer firefighter scholarship program; rewards volunteer firefighters who respond to twenty-five percent of emergency calls for eight years with a student loan award equal to four times the SUNY tuition rate; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a volunteer firefighter scholarship program; and making an appropriation relating therefor
